title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document project requirements, including hardware specifications, software requirements, and user experience expectations for the HolographicWorkstation.

title: Design Holographic User Interface (UI)
description: Create a design for the holographic UI, including layout, interaction patterns, and visual styles.

title: Design Holographic Projection System
description: Develop a design for the 3D projection system that will be used in the HolographicWorkstation.

title: Design Gesture Control System
description: Develop a design for the gesture control system that will be used to interact with the HolographicWorkstation.

title: Develop Holographic UI Components
description: Create the actual holographic UI components based on the design.

title: Develop Projection System Hardware and Software
description: Develop the hardware and software for the 3D projection system.

title: Develop Gesture Control Software
description: Develop the software for the gesture control system.

title: Integrate UI Components with Projection and Gesture Systems
description: Combine the developed UI components, projection system, and gesture control system into a functioning HolographicWorkstation.
dependencies: Develop Projection System Hardware and Software

title: Perform Quality Assurance (QA) Testing
description: Test the HolographicWorkstation for functionality, usability, and performance issues.
dependencies: Integrate UI Components with Projection and Gesture Systems

title: Resolve QA Issues
description: Fix any identified issues during QA testing.

title: Document HolographicWorkstation User Guide
description: Create a user guide detailing the setup, usage, and troubleshooting procedures for the HolographicWorkstation.
dependencies: Integrate UI Components with Projection and Gesture Systems

title: Deploy HolographicWorkstation
description: Prepare for and execute the deployment of the HolographicWorkstation.
